Sentencas: The method of electrostatic spray pyrolysis was designed to apply protective coatings based on Mn-Co spinel to ferrite stainless steels (Crofer22APU and 08Kh18T1).
Titulo: Protective coatings based on Mn-Co spinel for current collectors of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The comparative thermogravimetric (TG) studies of ferrite stainless steels with and without protective coatings were carried out.
Titulo: Protective coatings based on Mn-Co spinel for current collectors of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical characteristics of protective coatings exposed to long current loading were studied.
Titulo: Protective coatings based on Mn-Co spinel for current collectors of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The formation processes of Cr(2)O(3) oxide films were studied at the contact of ferrite stainless steel with La(0.8)Sr(0.2)MnO(3) ionic and electronic conductor.
Titulo: Protective coatings based on Mn-Co spinel for current collectors of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The coatings of Mn-Co spinel were shown not preventing formation of continuous oxide film on the stainless steel surface.
Titulo: Protective coatings based on Mn-Co spinel for current collectors of solid oxide fuel cells
